body_html: Is it something that was fixed recently? I only see "limit_epochs" as a variable made by string_input_producer, and it's regular, not trainable variable -- https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/input.py#L76

body: Is it something that was fixed recently? I only see "limit_epochs" as a variable made by string_input_producer, and it's regular, not trainable variable -- https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/input.py#L76
